ResourceHeader.ResourceName: OMTI Tilting Photometer (TILT3) at Athabasca, Canada
ResourceHeader.Description: Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers (OMTIs) Tilting Photometer -3 (TILT3) Data. The TILT3 measures 486.1nm and 427.8nm auroral intensities at 5 directions (+-74.88, +-37.44, 0deg) in the nort-south meridian with tilting the interference filter. For more information, see http://stdb2.isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp/omti/. Digital data are available upon request to PI.
